reviewText: It was fantastic! I Sang with the choir when they were on that trip. It was wonderful to find the DVD again. I saw myself and all my friends thank you.

We have watched this wonderful video many times until it was worn out and wish it was on DVD.  It's in part a documentary of Israel and the historical places where Jesus walked, taught, lived and died, with music sung by the world renowned Mormon Tabernacle Choir as they tour the Holy Land.  I highly recommend it.
